game.name: Rebel Reenactment: Battle of the Wilderness
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fight in massive line battles in this brutal shooter set during the American Civil War, in the Battle of the Wilderness of May, 1864.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight in massive line battles in this brutal shooter set during the American Civil War, in the Battle of the Wilderness of May, 1864.
